amendment.description: Amendment strikes all after the enacting clause and inserts new text entitled, "Cambodia Democracy Act of 2018".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Royce (CA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Royce (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Royce (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
